input.name: spa
input.label: Tracking type – SPA modes
input.help-text: If your page is a Single Page application, you can choose to track history or hash routing.

input.name: honorDnt
input.label: Honor Do Not Track
input.help-text: By default we track every visitor to your website, regardless of them having DNT turned on or not.

input.name: ignoreCanonical
input.label: Ignore canonicals
input.help-text: If there’s a canonical URL in place, then by default we use it instead of the current URL.
